mapper.insert: INSERT INTO demo_plan(status, create_at, update_at, year, quantity, inspection, exam, interview, admission) VALUES(#{status}, NOW(), NOW(), #{year}, #{quantity}, #{inspection}, #{exam}, #{interview}, #{admission})
mapper.select: SELECT id, status, year, quantity, inspection, exam, interview, admission FROM demo_plan WHERE year = #{year}
SELECT id, status, year, quantity, inspection, exam, interview, admission FROM demo_plan ORDER BY year DESC
